channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Huge amount of rubbish in the lay-by and beyond, 27th December
item.description:
Heading along the Golden Valley from Cheltenham towards Gloucester in the lay-by the bin is never emptied and the rubbish is overflowing into the lay-by and along the grass verge {what a mess it looks along the gateway from Cheltenham to Gloucester) not a good advertisement for the Arle Court Park and Ride visitors !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Scaffold and debris, 26th December
item.description:
I assume no license for this scaffold as no pedestrian diversion signage and infringes on highway. Sand and debris all over pavement. When it rains this will flow into drains blocking them.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Daffodil Street, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Obstruction by unpermitted skip, scaffolding, building material on pavement

item.title: Flags mounted on public infrastructure, 26th December
item.description:
Flags mounted on public infrastructure (lampposts) either side of railway bridge since 23rd Dec. Unsightly and concerned for safety.of any members of public attempting to remove.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Two Hedges Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: A tree has fallen across the bridge across the small stream, 25th December
item.description:
A tree, c 50cm in diameter has fallen directly across the footpath where the path crosses from one field to the other, before joining the minor road to the west.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Witcombe Roman Villa, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
